text:
@HassanJavid_ @NayabGJan Dumbest tweet of the day.
Should govt build #Covid19hospitals &wait for people to show as in a fast food restaurant?
Tax the rich? rich are 1% if population,  how much more can they be taxed?
Allocate resources? Take money from #COVID19 to give to provinces in global recession?

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain
